mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_user_collection_3in7 ( universityId, majorCode, batch, userId, createDate ) VALUES ( #{universityId}, #{majorCode}, #{batch}, #{userId}, #{createDate} )
mapper.select: select uu.id as universityId,zz.majorCode as majorCode,uu.provinceCode,tmp.batch as batch,zz.universityName as universityName,zz.major as majorName,tmp.batch,tmp.planEnrolling as planNumber,zz.selectSubject as selectSubject ,1 as isFavorite,collection.id as cid from zgk_user_collection_3in7 collection INNER join (select batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=330000 and pp.year=2016 ) tmp ON collection.batch = tmp.batch AND collection.majorCode = tmp.majorCode AND collection.universityId = tmp.universityId INNER join zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId WHERE collection.userId = #{userId} order by tmp.universityId asc limit ${offset},${rows}
